name: The Wanderer (mattH109, TripleF)
description:
A short game made for the 2016 Mystic Western Game Jam.

The game is about a spiritual journey through the desert to eventually meet up with a spirit animal.

With only two weeks to compete the game, life just got in the way for all of us during the second week.

Despite bugs etc, I'm quite happy with the end result all things considered.

I might pursue this game idea further at a later date to improve on all the things we missed/didn't have time for

Credits:

Fred Mulholland - Code, Design - https://twitter.com/big_triple_f

Tayla James - Characters, Art - https://twitter.com/Gomgrut

Kirsten Mathews - Menu Art, Environment Krazy Games

Matt Halse - Design, Environment - https://twitter.com/m_halse

Music used with permission by Urisne Vulpine - http://www.ursinevulpine.com/

Low poly rocks by - https://twitter.com/23SpaceRobots

Low Poly cowboy by - Manuel Alberto Avila
